Author: mukbonk
Text: It’s a choose your own adventure!  Choose to log and go to page 45: repeated googling for calorie information, ordering a water in between each drink so you “don’t dehydrate and avoid a hangover”, the phrase “no, I really do like vodka soda” coming out of your mouth, eating too little to compensate for the alcohol consumption leading to easier drunken blackouts, looming sense of doom  Choose not to log and go to page 101: constant body checking, mental exhaustion, asking too many times if you look too bloated for this dress, incessant fear leading to grumpy attitude, waking up first to go for a walk/run praying it counter balances whatever the shit show of the rest of the day may bring
